hero.headline: Smart Design.
hero.subtext: IMPAKT Studio focuses on real value. The “K” in IMPAKT stands for Key Impact — the meaningful and practical impact that design brings to a brand.

about.headline: We focus on impact, not illusion.
about.p1: IMPAKT Studio was founded with one mission: delivering real value. A beautiful interface is only the beginning — real-world performance is the goal.
about.p2: Transparency is at the core of our process — from pricing to execution. No empty promises, only data-driven decisions and Key Impact.
about.p3: From early-stage founders to established companies, we tailor solutions that fit your goals and resources.
about.transparencyText: Clear pricing, no hidden costs, strategic consultation before execution.
about.performanceText: Lifetime technical support and website maintenance after launch.

projects.headline: Selected Projects
projects.subheadline: Explore frontend demos crafted with attention to UI/UX and performance.
projects.p1_desc: A modern shopping experience focused on usability and conversion.
projects.p2_desc: Data-driven dashboards with intuitive visualization and insights.
projects.p3_desc: Minimalist design highlighting visuals, typography, and brand identity.

services.headline: IMPAKT Services
services.web_desc: Domain and hosting consultation, UI/UX design, and full website development tailored to business goals.
services.social_desc: Organic engagement strategies across Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.
services.brand_desc: Building clear, consistent brand identities aligned with your market.

why.why.title: Why Choose IMPAKT?
why.subheadline: Real value, flexible pricing, dedicated support.
why.p1_desc: Service packages designed for students, startups, and enterprises.
why.p2_desc: We analyze first, then build — every step is transparent.
why.p3_desc: Lifetime maintenance and technical support to ensure stability.

services_page.title: Detailed Services
services_page.subtitle: In-depth solutions for every growth stage
services_page.web_detail: From domain and hosting consultation to full website development. UI-only design is also available.
services_page.social_detail: Organic engagement systems that enhance brand credibility.
services_page.pricing_note: * Flexible pricing with special support for student and early-stage projects.

portfolio_page.title: Project Library
portfolio_page.subtitle: Where ideas turn into reality through design and code

contact.headline: Connect with IMPAKT
contact.desc: Leave your details below or reach out via social media. We respond within 24 hours.
contact.success_sub: Thank you for reaching out. IMPAKT will get back to you shortly.
